definition: see 方枘圓鑿|方枘圆凿[fang1 rui4 yuan2 zao2]
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
chisel/to bore a hole/to chisel or dig/(literary) (bound form) certain/authentic/irrefutable/also pr. [zuo4]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
compasses, set square and straight line marker (idiom); fig. established standard/norms/criteria
cow and famous steed at the same trough (idiom); fig. the common and the great are treated alike
to attain a state of perfect governance (idiom)
to stand on tiptoe and crane one's neck (idiom); fig. to yearn for sth
follow the same old path (idiom); stuck in a rut/always the same routine
